stories.title: 7 Shocking Facts about Potatoes
stories.author: Lemony Snicket
stories.content: Potatoes are only grown in Idaho. They have eyes. They are the source of Americas official dish: french fries. They can break windows.They are the next green energy source.

stories.title: Yahoo is changing its name
stories.author: Seth Millstein
stories.content: Bloomberg reported Monday that Yahoo! CEO Marissa Mayer will resign from the board of the company, which is also going to rename itself Altaba Inc. Several others will be stepping down from the board as well, including Richard Hill, Jane Shaw, co-founder David Filo, chairman Maynard Webb, and former chairman Eddy Hartenstein. The departures and name change will be official once the company's billion-dollar sale to Verizon is complete.

stories.title: Vegan Birkenstocks have arrived
stories.author: Rosie Narasaki
stories.content: It's been a long time coming, but beloved sandal brand Birkenstocks is finally releasing a non-leather option. So, when are vegan Birkenstocks coming out? Luckily for us, they're already here: They're arriving at the official online store on Jan. 9, and they'll be available at select retail locations starting in February. The sandals' vegan options have actually been available in Europe for a while now (they even picked up a 2016 Vegan Fashion Award from PETA in Germany), so it's exciting to see that we're finally getting the new shoes here in the U.S.
